name: found-poems
description: Found Poems monorepo (apps, site, and Supabase orchestration)

scripts.prisma:generate: pnpm --filter services-server exec prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.dev:db:migrate: dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --filter services-server exec -- prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prod:db:migrate: heroku run -a found-poems-server "cd services/server && pnpm exec prisma migrate deploy"
